level.heading: Conformity with settlement agreements.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be deemed to require the Commission to modify, set aside, or otherwise adjust the terms of a settlement approved by the Commission in Formal Case No. 945. To the extent the existence of a settlement obviates the need for proceedings or findings as are referred to in this chapter, the Commission may dispense with the proceedings or findings.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-107
level.text: For Law 13-107, see notes following ยง 34-1501.
